data.name: Visa Credit Card
data.description: A Visa Credit Card with a competitive rate, no annual fee and up to 55 days interest free.

features.additionalInfo: For greater convenience and flexibility you can share you Bank Australia credit card with 1 additional card holder provided they are at least 18 years old. The card will be in their name but you will remain responsible for the account.

Use instore, online and withdraw local currency at millions of locations, everywhere Visa is accepted. Cards are enabled to support diverse needs with raised bumps on the left hand-side on the front face of the card.
You can self-serve your day-to-day banking needs via Bank Australia's App or Internet Banking.

features.additionalValue: Google, Samsung and Apple Pay available
features.additionalInfo: Leave your wallet behind and pay for the things you need with Google Pay/ Samsung Pay/ Apple Pay.
Up to 55 days interest free days for purchases
Notifications can be enabled in the App or through Internet Banking, allowing you to be alerted either by email, sms or through the App about your card/account activity.

Card Controls: Decide the features you want enabled on your card including card lock, digital wallet, pay wave, international transactions, ATM withdrawals or online/instoretransactions and simply switch them on or off from your App or Internet Banking.
There is no limit to the number of VISA transactions you can make.

constraints.additionalInfo: Minimum Credit Limit of $1000 is required

eligibility.additionalInfo: Natural Person or In trust for a Natural Person or Non-Individual entity
Each application for credit is subject to our normal lending criteria and approval.
Available to citizens or permanent resident of Australia and valid Visa holders. Make sure you are currently in receipt of a regular income.

fees.name: International Transaction fee
fees.additionalInfo: The International Transaction fee applies to Visa transactions where there is a currency conversion and/or the transaction is processed overseas

fees.name: Visa emergency card/cash overseas fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when you need an emergency replacement card or cash delivered to you on an urgent basis to an address overseas.

fees.name: Exceeding available funds fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged on accounts when your balance falls below zero or your negative balance exceeds any agreed overdraft limit. Additional interest is charged on overdrawn amounts.

fees.name: Delivery fee for an urgent replacement of lost, stolen or damaged Visa card in Australia
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged when you need an emergency replacement card or cash delivered to you on an urgent basis to an Australian address.

fees.name: Cash Advance Fee - Domestic
fees.additionalInfo: A fee charged to any cash advance within Australia through all channels

fees.name: Cash Advance Fee - Overseas
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to any cash advance made outside Australia, $3.50 plus Foreign Currency Conversion Fee is applicable.

fees.name: Dishonour fee
fees.additionalInfo: When we dishonour a debit presented to us because there aren't enough available funds in your account

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Up to 55 days interest free days for purchases
Up to 55 days interest free days for purchases
